content.question: <math alttext="the limit as h approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, x plus h, close parenthesis, squared, plus 4 times, open parenthesis, x plus h, close parenthesis, minus x squared, minus 4 x, and denominator h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math> is

choices.label: <math alttext="x cubed, plus x to the fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
